content: john f kennedy creates an absorbing insightful and distinguished biography of one of americas most legendary presidents while current fashion in kennedy scholarship is to deride the mans achievements this book describes kennedys strengths explains his shortcomings and offers many new revelationsthere are many specialized books on kennedys career but no firstclass modern biographyone that takes advantage of the huge volume of recent books and articles and new material released by the jfk library ten years in the making this is a balanced and judicious profile that goes beyond the clash of interpretations and offers a fresh nuanced perspective
title: john f kennedy a biography
